title: Salt and Brine Meat Preservation
brief: Use salt or saltwater solution to preserve meat when other methods aren't available.
steps: Step 1: For brine method: create saltwater solution strong enough to preserve meat.
Step 2: Completely submerge meat in brine solution - solution must cover all meat.
Step 3: For dry salt method: thoroughly coat meat with salt on all surfaces.
Step 4: Keep salted meat in container to catch moisture drawn out.
Step 5: Before cooking, wash off salt thoroughly with clean water.
warnings: This is preservation only - meat must still be cooked before eating.
Wash salt off completely before cooking to avoid oversalting.
Ensure meat is completely covered by brine or salt for effective preservation.
